main.name: Hasimy
main.bio: I'm a student on Vocational High Telkom Malang, I program for back-end services using Node.js, with its framework such as Express and Restify. As of now I'm experimenting with Deno, a secure runtime for JavaScript and TypeScript.
main.contactmessage: Send me a message, and I'll contact you soon!
